short_summary: Supply and Delivery of Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) for Various Locations
description: Defence Construction Canada invites firms to submit proposals for supplying and delivering electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE) for various locations across Canada, except Quebec.
full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal (RFP) for Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment Standing Offer**

**Project Number:** NRORPOG_80705

**Introduction:**
Defense Construction Canada (DCC) invites interested firms to submit proposals for a Standing Offer (SO) to provide electric vehicle supply equipment (EVSE) related services to the Department of National Defense (DND) across various locations in Canada, excluding Quebec.

**Objective:**
The objective of this RFP is to select one (1) contractor to sign a National Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an "as and when required" basis for a period of three (3) years from the date of establishment. The estimated maximum value of this contract is $5,750,000.00.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will be required to provide the following services:

* Level 2 7.2 kW, 240V, 30A, 60Hz, Single Wall mounted – NEMA 3R
* Level 3 50 kW, 600V, 100A, 60Hz, Single Pedestal – NEMA 3R
* Subscription fees for gateway charging station, per year
* Subscription fees for non-gateway charging station, per year
* Maintenance costs for Level 2 Charging Station, per year
* Maintenance costs for Level 3 Charging Station, per year

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria outlined in the RFP document.

**Timeline:**
The closing date for proposals is October 10, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. All documents are available on MERX.com.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Steve Kennedy at [steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca) or 613-769-2659.

**Additional Information:**
The total potential duration of the Standing Offer is ten (10) years, and the maximum potential value is $14,000,000.00. The Standing Offer may be extended for up to two additional periods of two (2) years, making the total potential duration of the Standing Offer ten (10) years.
